title: 820-2850-a no backlight only when battery is plugged in
message: I got this board that works fine when is running from the power adapter but if I connect battery the backlight goes away. Thanks in advance.

title: 820-2850-a no backlight only when battery is plugged in
message:
Voltage on R9731 pin 2? Voltage on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT? Measure with LCD connected and battery of course.

I assume you did a PRAM reset already!
